name: Into The Blue Sky
description:
Into The Blue Sky is a short first-person platformer, made in just 3 days, for the 'Hardest Game Jam Ever (Maybe)'

The Jams 3 themes where as follow:

'It takes two' - I implemented this with the character swapping.
'Blue is true' - This was a hard one, you'll mostly see it through some colour choices.
'And it flew' - With the last theme I created spring platforms, to launch the characters around.

I hope you'll enjoy the game, thanks:)

- VinciDa
